title: Spacious 2BR2BA near Caltech, Old Town Pasadena
posting_body: ['**Ready to Move in July 29th**', 'Located on the second level, this spacious 2-bed, 2 bath condo is only blocks away from shops and restaurants lining South Lake Ave and  Colorado Blvd and convenient to Old Town, Caltech and Pasadena City College.', 'The resort-style pool and spa create a sense of vacation at home, and the workout facility & sauna provide practicality and convenience.', 'LEASE TERMS', 'An application and a one time credit check fee of $30 per adult is required.', 'Gross monthly income, credit verification, and references are taken into consideration along with the ability to pay and number of people.', 'Apartments are rented on a month-to-month basis after the required one-year minimum.', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year', 'Deposit: $2950', 'Square Ft: Approx. 1000', 'Floor: 2nd', 'Pet Policy:', 'No Pets allowed', 'SUMMARY OF RENTAL FEATURES', '* Hardwood Floors', '* Air Conditioner', '* Ceiling Fans', '* Wall Furnace', '* Refrigerator', '* Brand new dishwasher', '* Stove/Oven', '* Microwave', '* Garbage Disposal', '*', 'In-unit laundry + dryer', '* Balcony', '* Walk-in closet in master bedroom', '* Elevator and stair access', '* 2 assigned parking spaces in gated garage']
